sentence.Network_en: Gimi: [ Yi - jun puts his hand in a bowl ] Yuck, what's that?
sentence.Network_cn: 吉米: ( 怡君 把他的手放进一个碗里 ) 好恶, 那是什么?

sentence.Network_en: Joe : Yuck ! That's gross ! Why planting get so disgusting?
sentence.Network_cn: 真恶! 为甚麽种植要搞的这麽恶心 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: Some readers love them, while others have said " yuck. "
sentence.Network_cn: 有些读者很喜欢, 而另一些则说, “ 讨厌! ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版八年级上册英语单词表（含音标） ... 43 unhealthy a. 不健康的 44 yuck 讨厌 45 maybe ad. 大概,也许.
八年级上册英语单词表（人教版）_百度知道 ... unhealthy 不健康的 yuck 呸(表示反感,厌恶等) maybe 也许;大概.
迪斯尼动画英语《公主与青蛙》台词 ... 1. whole wide world 到处，所有的东西 2. Yuck 恶心 3. Is that so? 真的是这样么？.
冰凌_新浪博客 ... asap 尽快 yuck 真恶心 later 再见.

auth_sentence.content: Yuck, I thought, that sounds like Western paranoia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yuck, I thought, that sounds like Western paranoia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yuck, I thought, that sounds like Western paranoia.

auth_sentence.content: There is of course what Prof Davies called the yuck factor.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is of course what Prof Davies called the yuck factor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is of course what Prof Davies called the yuck factor.

auth_sentence.content: Except for the "yuck" factor, this would be humane.
auth_sentence.res_content: Except for the "yuck" factor, this would be humane.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Except for the "yuck" factor, this would be humane.
